    Add Rules to a Validation Rules List

    addRules.Rd

    Generic to add items to a S3 list or vector

    Usage

    addRules(x, y, ruleset = "default")

    Arguments

    x

    Named List or vector object to add to

    y

    Named List or vector to append to x

    ruleset

    Character Name of rule set to add the rules to in x. If not present, it will be created.

    See also

    Other validation: editRules(), makeValidData(), validRules(), validateColumn(), validateDF()

    Examples

    # Add rule to default 
rulesObj <- validRules()
rulesObj <- rulesObj %>% 
    addRules(list('newrule' = function(x) x =='B'), ruleset = 'newRuleSet')
    
str(rulesObj)
#> List of 2
